property.name: xasecure.policymgr.clientssl.keystore
property.description: Path to keystore file. Only required for two-way SSL. This property should not be included for one-way SSL

property.name: xasecure.policymgr.clientssl.keystore.credential.file
property.description: Path to credential file for the keystore; the credential should be in alias sslKeyStore. Only required for two-way SSL. This property should not be included for one-way SSL

property.name: xasecure.policymgr.clientssl.truststore.credential.file
property.description: Path to credential file for the truststore; the credential should be in alias sslTrustStore
